title: Understanding GAD
text: Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) is a mental health condition characterized by persistent and excessive worry. It affects how a person thinks, feels, and behaves.

title: Symptoms of GAD
text: People with GAD often experience symptoms such as restlessness, fatigue, difficulty concentrating, irritability, muscle tension, and sleep disturbances.

hintAnswer: persistent and excessive worry about everyday events and activities
title: Identifying Key Characteristics
text: What is the primary characteristic of Generalized Anxiety Disorder?
choices: persistent and excessive worry about everyday events and activities
persistent worry, restlessness, and physical symptoms like fatigue and muscle tension
anxiety reaction to stress that results in a panic attack
